characters.story: Attitude ability heart commands sharply "Tigh!" - manner bearing!
Sign of the tiger roof hands questions "Yin? 3am-5am?" curiously - respect!
To perform water tiger sign bends down drooping "Yahn" - practice act performance!
Sign of the dragon morning commands sharply "Chun?" curiously - 7am-9am dragon hour!
Morning sun dragon sign questions "Chun? Dawn?" curiously - daybreak morrow!
Agriculture morning bend questions "Nohng? Farming?" curiously - cultivating!
Concentrated water agriculture questions "Nohng? Thick?" curiously - dense!
To deliver road give commands sharply "Sohng!" - see off send dispatch!
Ghost spirit mask bends down drooping "Gway" - demon dead!
Demon hemp ghost questions "Mwo? Devil?" curiously - witch!
Lump dirt ghost commands sharply "Kwigh!" - piece chunk clod dollar!
Dragon scales claws questions "Lohng? Imperial?" curiously - mythical beast!
